injectables.name: Auth

components.name: App
components.templateData:
<!-- Show sidenav everywhere except /auth -->
<app-sidenav *ngIf="!isAuthRoute"></app-sidenav>

<!-- For /auth routes (login/register) just show the router-outlet -->
<router-outlet *ngIf="isAuthRoute"></router-outlet>
